item.title: Final Competition Winner
item.description:

item.title: Competition Winner Week 2
item.description:
The second winner in the Three competition on The Right Hook has been announced onÂ Georgeâ€™s radio show. It is Castle Tunes from Dublin who wroteÂ a very detailed review of the Squeezebox Boom.

One of the prize phones fromÂ ThreeÂ and Custom-1 headphones fromÂ KlipschÂ will shortly be on their way to Dublin.

There are another two weeks left in the competition. So getÂ writing gadget reviewsÂ on the site or via SMS. The winner will be announced each Monday on the show which you can also listen to on the Newstalk web-site.
